byline.contributor: Matt Flegenheimer and Thomas Kaplan contributed reporting.
byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and SUSANNE CRAIG

abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio and Gov Andrew M Cuomo pledge to find ways to work together after latest squabble over state laws governing real estate tax breaks and mayoral control of the city’s public schools.
lead_paragraph: Monday’s rapprochement, temporary or not, came after an episode of conflict extraordinary even by the standards of this notably rocky relationship.

headline.main: Cuomo and de Blasio Put Their Gloves Back On
headline.print_headline: Governor and the Mayor Put Their Gloves Back On

snippet: Monday’s rapprochement, temporary or not, came after an episode of conflict extraordinary even by the standards of this notably rocky relationship.
